name: Union Africaine
value: With over 1 billion people, an area of around 29 million km2 (11 million sq mi), 55 state members, the African Union has enormous potentials to put the African continent on the global development path.

name: Ghana - Rwanda - South Africa - Namibia
value: Ghana - Rwanda - South Africa - Namibia - Botswana are the five countries that canbe considered as role models for the other African countries in term of political stability and economic growth.

name: Spiritualities
value: The keys for the success in this life and in the next one for the human kind.
